page.title: 09Education In Newburgh Area
page.content: In this area there are two schools both of which are primary schools.One is in Tipperty and the other is in Newburgh.Newburgh has 153 pupils and 8 full time teachers.Tipperty has 14 pupils and 1 full time teacher. At the end of primary 7 you are moved up to the secondary school in Ellon.However some children have the opportunity to go to primary and secondary school in Aberdeen. We would have various assignments to complete during the morning including Maths,Language and Free choice.Some days we have visiting specialists for Art,Drama,Home Economics and Music.We have a 20 minute break during the morning and stop for lunch at 12.20p.m.School begins in the afternoon at 1.20p.m.and continues until it is time to go home at 3.30p.m.with a short break at 2.20p.m.
